title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 and 50+ other LLMs locally with a single command-line tool and a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that treats Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); model manager, RAG, multi-user, plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper that adds chat history, prompt templates and markdown rendering on top of ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda/rocm/cpu) and docker-compose examples for headless servers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI; ready to clone and hack.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder pipelines for production RAG.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with async streaming, dependency injection helpers and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async client for Ollama; tokio, serde, streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go(lang) client library with context cancellation, streaming and model management wrappers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into servers with slash-commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via mentions or dedicated channels.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI menu-bar app for chatting with Ollama models without leaving the desktop.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” commands for summarizing notes, brainstorming and Q&A inside vaults.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Utility to convert and push any Hugging Face GGUF model into the Ollama model library with one command.
